ica.sugarwars

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.gameengine.icadroids.objects.GameObject
      • android.gameengine.icadroids.objects.MoveableGameObject
        • ica.sugarwars.CollidableGameObject
          • ica.sugarwars.Entity

    Enemy, Player

    public abstract class Entity
extends CollidableGameObject
    Author:
    Sijmen

    • Field Detail

      • health

        private int health
        The health points of the entity.

      • maxHealth

        protected int maxHealth
        Default a entity has a maximum of 100 health points. There might be entitys with more ore less max health.

      • theGame

        protected SugarWars theGame
        The game where this enemy is angry.

      • healthBar

        protected HealthBar healthBar
        The healthbar of this enemy. To disable set healthBar to null.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity(SugarWars theGame)
        constructor to create a new Entity
        Parameters:
        theGame - The game where this enemy lives.

    • Method Detail

      • setHealth

        public void setHealth(int hp)
        Set the health of the entithy. If health si below 0, the entity will die. If health above the max it will show an error and set the health to maxhealth.
        Parameters:
        hp - The new health.

      • setMaxHealth

        public void setMaxHealth(int maxHealth)
        Set the maximum health of this entity
        Parameters:
        maxHealth - the maximum health

      • getMaxHealth

        public int getMaxHealth()
        Get the maximum healht of this entity
        Returns:
        the maximum health

      • drawCustomObjects

        public void drawCustomObjects(Canvas canvas)
        Draws custom stuff on the screen.
        Overrides:
        drawCustomObjects in class android.gameengine.icadroids.objects.GameObject
        Parameters:
        canvas - The Android canvas. Use this provided object to draw for example text, rectangles and colors. For the api see: http://developer.android.com/reference/android/graphics/Canvas.html

      • getHealth

        public int getHealth()
        Get the current health points. This value is never below 0 or above maxHealth
        Returns:
        the current health.

      • onDie

        public abstract void onDie()
        This method is automaticly called when health is or below 0. The entity should be removed from the game.

      • isFriendly

        public abstract boolean isFriendly()
        Check if this entity is friendly to Player
        Returns:
        wether or not this entity is friendly.
